mapper.insert:
insert into temperature
id,
temperature,
time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update temperature
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from temperature order by id desc limit 5

select
from temperature where time between #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id asc

select
from temperature where time between #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id desc limit 1

select
from temperature where time between #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by temperature desc limit 1

select
from temperature where time between #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by temperature asc limit 1
